title: Justin Bieber’s mum praises his ‘beautiful’ new wife Hailey Baldwin
text:
Caption: Justin Bieber\’s mum praises his wife Hailey (Picture: Getty; @pattiemallette)

Hailey Baldwin has been fully welcomed into the Bieber family a week after her latest wedding to Justin according to his mum Pattie Mallette.

Raving about her ‘beautiful’ new daughter-in-law in the comment section on a video Justin shared with his model bride on Instagram (aren’t parents on social media the best?), the 44-year-old couldn’t stop praising Hailey.

‘You have truly been blessed with a BEAUTIFUL bride, son. INSIDE AND OUT,’ she wrote.

‘I don’t think I could have picked a better match for you. You are a gift to each other.

‘I am grateful and consistently humbled by the love and blessings of God over you both. My mamas heart is full. Okay. Here we go again…’

Having initially tied the knot a year ago in a New York courthouse, the young couple decided to celebrate with their friends and family in South Carolina, with Pattie making for one glamorous member of the wedding party.

Saying ‘I do’ in front of a seriously impressive guest list including the Jenner siblings (Kylie wearing THAT DRESS), Jaden Smith and Hailey’s model mates, the lavish affair saw the pair flash over $700,000 of wedding day bling, including Tiffany bands and Justin in a glittering grill, because of course.

E! News states the ceremony was conducted by the Sorry singer’s pastor Judah Smith, while the model’s sister Alaia Baldwin and cousin Ireland Baldwin were her bridesmaids.

An insider added to People that everyone was handed drinks prior to the chapel ceremony, before then enjoying a cocktail hour ahead of the reception that took place in the resort’s ballroom.

Justin and Hailey have had a rollercoaster relationship after they were first rumoured to be dating, back in 2014.

After a long split, the pair reunited last year, and announced their engagement last July, before surprising us all by confirming they secretly got married in November.

Still, as some famous playwright said, the course of true love never did run smooth. Here’s wishing them a long and happy marriage!
